channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- S3300
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- S3300

item.title: CVE-2017-2712|2024-09-16T17:18:28.209Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- s3300
item.description: S3300 V100R006C05 have an Ethernet in the First Mile (EFM) flapping vulnerability due to the lack of type-length-value (TLV) consistency check. An attacker may craft malformed packets and send them to a device to cause EFM flapping.
